[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [Statistics](./harp-mapview.statistics.md)

## Statistics class

Manages a set of timers. The main objective of `Statistics` is to log these timers. You can disable statistics to minimize their impact on performance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Statistics 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(name, enabled)](./harp-mapview.statistics._constructor_.md) |  | Sets up a group of timers. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [enabled](./harp-mapview.statistics.enabled.md) |  | boolean |  |
|  [name](./harp-mapview.statistics.name.md) |  | string \| undefined |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addTimer(timer)](./harp-mapview.statistics.addtimer.md) |  | Adds the timer specified. |
|  [createTimer(name, keepSamples)](./harp-mapview.statistics.createtimer.md) |  | Adds a timer, based on the name specified. |
|  [getTimer(name)](./harp-mapview.statistics.gettimer.md) |  | Gets a timer by name. |
|  [hasTimer(name)](./harp-mapview.statistics.hastimer.md) |  | Checks if a timer with the specified name already exists. |
|  [log(header, footer)](./harp-mapview.statistics.log.md) |  | Prints all values to the console. |
|  [reset()](./harp-mapview.statistics.reset.md) |  | Resets all timers. |
